name: Packing Up Meditation
description:
Packing up your belongings forces you to closely examine and stand in judgement of every possession you have accumulated. It is a trip into your past, a chance to rediscover long forgotten treasures or let go of old memories weighing you down. Packing can be a bitter end or the beginning of an exciting new adventure.

This experience was created as a part of the Meditation Game project and is playable on September 3rd.

 https://meditations.games/ 

The inspiration was very much my lived experience at the time of making the experience. I was in the middle of packing our house to move and I don't look forward to doing that again any time soon!  For fun here is a link to a twitter thread where I documented some of the other weird things I found while cleaning out my house.

https://twitter.com/CodeCrafty/status/1066170764267786240
